ygData.subject: New patch "features"
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the Meditate skill is pretty sweet.  Didn t even have to zone for it to work (read somewhere that we would have to zone for it to kick in the first
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the Meditate skill is pretty sweet. Didn't even have to zone for it
to work (read somewhere that we would have to zone for it to kick in the
first time).

Well, technically you zoned in as soon as you logged on. The patch message
says that we cannot train on meditate, but can we improve it? I tried medding
a bit with the casters, but never got the skill to improve. Is it capped at
1? At any rate, I died (as usual) last night and memming songs was a lot
quicker. Huzzah!

> Also noticed this interesting
> tidbit... you can no longer consume vast amounts of alcohol. Once you get
> to your... uhm... "drunkenness limit", you now get a message saying "You
> could not possibly consume more alcohol or get any more intoxicated!".

This is not new.

> Anyone else notice any other hidden things?

I noticed that even though Verant has finally given bards something we've
really wanted (meditate), that I got in this morning to a full inbox of people
griping about the fact that we don't "surf" anymore. Boo hoo hoo. It seems
some people aren't happy unless they have something to complain about.
